section2.topic: Maintain Similar Affiliations across Channel Nodes
section2.p: A Channel Server MUST maintain similar affiliations for a subscribed entity across all the Nodes of a Channel.

To achieve this a Client MUST only update the affiliation of the /posts Channel Node. The Channel Server MUST then maintain the affiliation of the other Channel Nodes appropriately according to the following table:

tr.th: Affiliation set for the /posts Channel Node
Affiliation implied for the other Channel Nodes

section2.p: Note that this only applies to Personal Channels as Topic Channels only have a /posts Node
